action.primary: Nourishes and invigorates the body, removes stasis, relieves convulsions, soothes the nerves, warms the Stomach and benefits the Intestines

indications: Goiter, scrofula, stomach pain, gastric ulcers, hyperacidity, diarrhea, epilepsy, acute or slow infantile convulsions, tetanus

notes: Medicinal parts: the whole starfish body.
Storage: keep in shady, cool and dry place.

It can reduce Phlegm, and eliminate the stagnation, so it has a function on women's breast lumps, other hard cores, and can prevent mammary gland hyperplasia and breast cancer. It can be taken for a long time.
Starfish cleaning method: Break every point of starfish, and cleanse of the black things.
